mapper.select: select p.no, p.lat, p.lon, p.title, p.content, p.hit, p.date, p.created_at, p.image, m.user_id, m.user_name from place p join members m on p.author = m.user_id
select p.no, p.lat, p.lon, p.title, p.content, p.hit, p.date, p.created_at, p.image, m.user_id, m.user_name from place p join members m on p.author = m.user_id where no = #{no} order by hit desc;
mapper.insert: insert into place (lat, lon, title, content, date, image, author) values (#{lat}, #{lon}, #{title}, #{content}, #{date}, #{image}, #{author.userId})
